attributes.action: Provide FE Colleges and sixth-form colleges with the same amount of funding for 16-19 years olds as is provided to schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently colleges teaching students aged 16-19 recieve less money than schools with sixth forms teaching the same pupils. Both schools and colleges should get the same amount of income for these types of educational establishments.
